scripts.lint: eslint src/ && eslint --config tests/.eslintrc.json --env node build/ Gruntfile.js
scripts.compile-bundle: shx cat src/util.js src/alert.js src/button.js src/carousel.js src/collapse.js src/dropdown.js src/modal.js src/scrollspy.js src/tab.js src/tooltip.js src/popover.js | shx sed "s/^(import|export).*//" | babel --filename src/bootstrap.js | node ../../build/stamp.js > dist/bootstrap.js
scripts.test-cloud: ruby -r webrick -e "s = WEBrick::HTTPServer.new(:Port => 3000, :DocumentRoot => Dir.pwd, :Logger => WEBrick::Log.new('/dev/null'), :AccessLog => []); trap('INT') { s.shutdown }; s.start" & grunt saucelabs-qunit
